meanings.definition: A person who saves money by spending it wisely.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a scrimper and always looks for the best deals.
meanings.sent2: The scrimper at the store compared prices before making a purchase.
meanings.sent3: The scrimper decided to buy the discounted items to save more money.
meanings.sent4: She was a true scrimper, squeezing every penny until it screamed.
meanings.sent5: The scrimper's ability to budget effectively impressed everyone around.

meanings.definition: To save money by being thrifty or frugal.
meanings.sent1: I need to scrimper on groceries this month to stay within budget.
meanings.sent2: She scrimpers by using coupons and shopping during sales.
meanings.sent3: He tried to scrimper on his vacation expenses but ended up having a great time.
meanings.sent4: Scrimpering on utilities can lead to significant savings over time.
meanings.sent5: Learning to scrimper wisely can help achieve financial goals faster.
